original_title: The Proclamation of HM the King
overview: From St James's Palace in London, the historic proclamation of His Majesty the King takes place. For the first time since 1952, the Accession Council meets to make the formal declaration of the accession of the new sovereign. Following the Accession Council, the principal proclamation is read by Garter King of Arms.
tagline: The Proclamation of HM the King
title: The Proclamation of HM the King
